text: Yahya Christian Bonaud (1957 – 26 August 2019), also known as Yaḥyā ʿAlawī (or Yaḥyā Bonaud) was a French Islamologist, philosopher, writer and translator. He was a commentator of the Qur'an in French, and a professor at the Jāmī Theological Center at Al-Mustafa International University in Iran. He was born in Freiburg im Breisgau, Germany. Bonaud drowned after being involved in a boat crash on 26 August 2019 in Abidjan, Ivory Coast at the age of 62.Iran's Larijani condoles death of French philosopher Yahya Bonaud ==References== Category:2019 deaths Category:Accidental deaths by drowning Category:French philosophers Category:1957 births Category:French translators Category:Writers from Strasbourg
